thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com
thread.title: Jo B
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Jo B

author: Jo B
title: Jo B
text:
We bought a baby car seat from Kiddies Kingdom. They were much cheaper than any other website for the exact same product.
Delivery was really clear, I got an email and a text to say when it would arrive. I wasnt going to be home that day but there was a link on the email to request a different day. Really easy.
